text: Great to meet my US counterpart in Brussels Ambassador Ronald Gidwitz, U.S. Special Envoy to the EU & Ambassador to Belgium.  We discussed the importance of secure supply chains and the success of US, German & Canadian R&D and ingenuity in the Pfizer #COVID19 #vaccine 🇺🇸🇪🇺🇨🇦 https://t.co/TeeV7RJwKt
